card_text: If your "Plunder Patroll" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Draw 1 card. If you control a "Plunder Patroll" monster: You can send this face-up card from your field to the GY, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Your opponent draws 1 card, then you look at their hand and send 1 monster from it to the GY.$N●Look at your opponent's Extra Deck and send 1 monster from it to the GY.$NYou can only use each effect of "Pride of the Plunder Patroll" once per turn.
